QuestData.Title: Tiny Treasures
QuestData.Description:
My adults are in the field doing some research. So I stay here, patiently waiting, as they told me to do.
These monsters came and took my special treasures! They took my best friend in the whole world, my slug, Spitzy!
They took them all. They ran far. I do not move fast...
Could you please get them back, and find my family?
